title: Delta-P
alt: If you fire a Portal gun through the door of the wardrobe, space and time knot together, which leads to a frustrated Aslan trying to impart Christian morality to the Space sphere.
transcript:
[An open wardrobe, with a boat anchor attached to one corner, falling towards water.]
[Below the water line a formula with its variables explained is shown:]
Q = A * sqrt(2 * g * d)
Q = flow rate
A = area of opening
d = ocean depth (2Â km)
g = Earth gravity[And below the formula:]
Flow: ~400,000 liters/s
Water jet velocity: ~200 m/s[Caption below the frame:]
The White Witch didn't know what hit her.
